ygData.subject: New feature coming soon & other
ygData.msgSnippet: Yahoo Groups is coming out with a feature to allow a photos section to groups within a few weeks.  I would suggest when we get that feature, we use it to show

Subject: New feature coming soon & other
Message-ID: <9l9rpb+10371@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 687
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

Yahoo Groups is coming out with a feature to allow a photos section to 
groups within a few weeks.  I would suggest when we get that feature, 
we use it to show screen shots.

I received an email from Seth Mitchell (list-owner).  He was happy 
about the number of emails in his inbox from this group.

I plan on sending a special announcement out about the tournament.  I 
will be asking for votes, naming people who have voted, and asking 
about general interest in a tournament.  I will send the email to this 
group as normal email before I send it out as a special announcement. 
 This will be the ONLY special announcement I plan on sending until 
the tournament is ready for a go.
